name: UIDT v3.9: Unified Information-Density Theory - Complete Manuscript (Clean State)
description: The UIDT v3.9 software suite provides the canonical implementation and verification environment for the Unified Information-Density Theory. It includes the Python solver for the parameter-free derivation of the Yang-Mills Mass Gap (Δ≈1.710 GeV) and the Universal Gamma Invariant (γ≈16.339). Scientific integrity is maintained via strict evidence classification (A–D, plus D+ for analog verification). Clean State established after v3.3 withdrawal.
